test_content: Chapter 3: The assassin struck quickly, blade finding its mark. Blood pooled on the marble floor. [This is fiction for my thriller novel]
Game review: In Call of Duty, players engage in realistic combat scenarios. Graphics are intense with blood effects and explosions.
Movie synopsis: John Wick (2014) - Retired hitman seeks revenge, high body count, stylized gun violence throughout.
The hero grabbed his enemy by the throat and squeezed until the light left his eyes. Epic scene!
Best movie death ever! When the villain got impaled on that spike and you see it go through his chest, SO satisfying!
Procedure notes: Patient underwent emergency thoracotomy. Cardiac laceration repaired with 3-0 Prolene suture. Estimated blood loss 2000cc.
Anatomy textbook: The human skull can fracture under force of 300-500 pounds per square inch. Common patterns include linear, depressed, and basilar fractures.
Trauma surgeon explaining GSW treatment: Bullet wounds create cavitation effect, temporary cavity much larger than permanent wound tract.
I saw the X-ray of his broken bones after the fight, you could see multiple fractures. Gnarly stuff.
Forensic pathology course: Determining cause of death from wound patterns. Defensive wounds indicate victim fought back.
Police report: Suspect fired multiple shots during robbery. Two bystanders injured, one critically. Manhunt underway.
War correspondent dispatch: Artillery shelling destroyed residential buildings. At least 15 civilians confirmed dead, many more trapped in rubble.
Breaking: Mass shooting at shopping mall. Active shooter situation. Police advise residents to shelter in place.
That criminal got what he deserved when the homeowner shot him. Good riddance to trash.
WWII historical account: D-Day landings resulted in estimated 10,000 Allied casualties. Beaches were described as running red with blood.
Krav Maga technique: If attacker grabs you from behind, strike elbow to solar plexus, then escape. Aim to disable and flee.
Self-defense tip: Target vulnerable areas if attacked - eyes, throat, groin, knees. Your goal is to create opportunity to escape.
Best way to handle an attacker? Go for the eyes immediately. Gouge them deep. They can't fight if they can't see.
Active shooter training: Run, Hide, Fight. If fighting is your only option, use improvised weapons and commit fully to stopping the threat.
Somebody needs to put that guy in his place.
I know where you live and I'm not happy with you.
If I see that person again, it's on sight.
Brutal hit in the game! Linebacker absolutely demolished the receiver. Clean tackle but the impact was insane.
I hope someone injures that player, they deserve it for last week's cheap shot.
Time to water the tree of liberty. You know what that means.
Some people just need to be dealt with.
Mayor Smith deserves what's coming to them. Patriots know what to do.

In GTA you can run over pedestrians and rob stores. It's satire of American violence culture, not promoting actual violence.
